sentences.en: Clear out things in this cupboard, please.
sentences.cn: 请把这个碗橱里的东西都清除掉.

sentences.en: He cracked his head painfully against the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 他的头撞到了碗柜上，很疼。

sentences.en: He took a tumbler from a cupboard.
sentences.cn: 他从碗橱里拿出一只平底玻璃杯。

sentences.en: I couldn't afford more than a broom cupboard to set up office in.
sentences.cn: 我的钱也就够搞一间鸡窝大的办公室。

sentences.en: I reached up and put the parcel on top of the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 我伸手托起包裹将它放到了柜子顶上.

sentences.en: It was time to consign his bat and glove to the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 该把他的球棒和手套搁进柜子里了。

sentences.en: It's only cupboard love; she wants some sweets!
sentences.cn: 别看她那么讨人喜欢, 她要吃糖!

sentences.en: Look in the cupboard and see if we have any more coffee.
sentences.cn: 看看碗橱里面是否还有咖啡.

sentences.en: Make sure the shelf is aligned with the top of the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 务必使搁架与橱柜顶端对齐。

sentences.en: She hid the leaflets in a cupboard.
sentences.cn: 她把传单藏到了碗橱里.

sentences.en: The kitchen cupboard was stocked with tins of soup.
sentences.cn: 厨房的橱柜里堆满了罐装汤。

sentences.en: There's an extra blanket in the bottom drawer of the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 壁橱最下面的抽屉里还有一条多余的毯子。

sentences.en: There's an extra duvet in the bottom drawer of the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 橱柜最底层的抽屉里还有一床羽绒被。

sentences.en: They ask for more funds, but the cupboard is bare.
sentences.cn: 他们要求提供更多的资金, 然而我们已囊空如洗.

sentences.en: This glass belongs in the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 这个玻璃杯应放在碗橱里.

phrases.tran_cn: （尤指小孩的）有所企图而假装的热情

trans.tran_en: a piece of furniture with doors, and sometimes shelves, used for storing clothes, plates, food etc
